snippet: Prime Minister Wen Jiabao warned that China risk chaos unless the Communist Party overhauls its leadership and clears the way for economic reform.
abstract: Prime Minister Wen Jiabao issues a sharper and more urgent call for political change in China, warning that the nation risks a return to the chaos of the Cultural Revolution unless the governing Communist Party overhauls its leadership structure and clears the way for economic reform; gives scant indication of what political change might entail, and makes it clear that change would evolve in baby steps rather than by sweeping action.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Wen Jiabao warned that China risk chaos unless the Communist Party overhauls its leadership and clears the way for economic reform.

headline.seo: Wen Jiabao Calls for Political Reform but Sidesteps Details
headline.main: Wen Calls for Political Reform but Sidesteps Details
headline.print_headline: With Allusion To Past Chaos, China Premier Urges Reform
